name: Pawtualang Demo
description:
A place where you and your Lover? take a vacation and go around the Country! Superiority

> Made mostly by one person
> Story Matter
> Unique Art Styles
> Minigames
> Mixed Era
> Turn-Based Combat
>   Lovely friend
>  UwU

Let's do some silly adventure while your big brother is not home.

Want to stay updated? or wanna give a suggestion?  or You found a bug?
Join the Discord servers!
https://discord.gg/emfSy9yjQN

Have Fun!!
